title: Is Visma-Lease a Bike Cursed Again? 3 Key Riders Down Before Cobbles Classics Kickoff
content:
Wout van Aert and Matteo Jorgenson headline Visma-Lease a Bike in cobbles opener as illness and injury strike Dutch super team after an 'unlucky week.'

Read the full article at Is Visma-Lease a Bike Cursed Again? 3 Key Riders Down Before Cobbles Classics Kickoff on Velo.
author: ahood
